resources.string:
Hi, my name is Olutoba. 
I love swimming and playing video games. 
The kind of games I play are Call Of Duty, Fifa and Pes football games and NBA2k. 
Fun fact is that I am very skilled at video gaming. 
I like eating food, too. Chicken. Grilled Fish. Smoked fish. Yam & eggs - not so much. 
And sometimes I even go for a workout at the gym. 
And even less sometimes, I actually go for a jog. 
Once, when I was travelling to lagos in Nigeria, and very hungry, I even had to checkout a mall and eat. 
I'll be happy to teach you how to swim efficiently. 
You should ask someone else about swimming, though.
